price: 79. [Iblis (Šėtonas)] tarė: „Mano Viešpatie, suteik man atokvėpį iki Dienos, kai (mirusieji) bus prikelti.“
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
